entry.def: An accomplishment is something remarkable that has been done or achieved.

example.ex: For a novelist, that's quite an accomplishment...
example.tran: 对于一位小说家来说，那是相当了不起的成就。

example.ex: By any standards, the accomplishments of the past year are extraordinary.
example.tran: 不管以哪种标准来衡量，过去一年都成果斐然。

entry.def: Your accomplishments are the things that you can do well or the important things that you have done.
The accomplishment of something is the fact of achieving or finishing it.

example.ex: His function is vital to the accomplishment of the agency's mission.
example.tran: 要完成该机构的使命，他的作用至关重要。

means.word_mean: 2. an ability that has been acquired by training

auth_sentence.content: I would say that is his signature domestic accomplishment.
auth_sentence.res_content: I would say that is his signature domestic accomplishment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I would say that is his signature domestic accomplishment.

auth_sentence.content: It is immaculately produced and delivered with great accomplishment.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is immaculately produced and delivered with great accomplishment.

auth_sentence.content: Because they want this to have been their accomplishment.

Sentence.sentence: Determining whether different schools do or don't offer a high quality of education requires a look at man different measures, including students' overall academic accomplishments and their subsequent performance in college.
You diligence is worthy of encouragement, but effort does not equal accomplishment.
The example of Rembrandt's painting suggests that a distinction should be made between effort and accomplishment

sentences.en: Money will be crucial to the accomplishment of our objectives.
sentences.cn: 要实现我们的目标，钱是至关重要的。

means.word_mean: 技能, (社交上的)才艺，专长

sentences.en: Her technical accomplishment on the piano is startling.
sentences.cn: 她在钢琴方面的造诣令人惊歎。
他把出身看得重于才能。

sentences.en: Despite all its accomplishments,the so-called electronic brain must be programed by a human brain.
sentences.cn: 尽管电脑技艺无比,但它仍得由人来编制其程序。

sentences.en: The series of paintings is quite an accomplishment.
sentences.cn: 这一系列的绘画真是了不起的成就。

sentences.en: Several important milestones in foreign policy have been passed by this Congress and they can be chalked up as major accomplishments.
sentences.cn: 这次代表大会通过了对外政策中几起划时代的事件,并且它们可作为主要成就记录下来。
